enhanced_by.reason: The removeProtocols method relies on the protocols added by addProtocols to determine which protocols to remove.
The removeProtocols method may need to be invoked after ensuring the attribute is safe using isSafeAttribute.
Both methods deal with validating and managing protocols for attributes, making testValidProtocol a good candidate for assertions related to removeProtocols.
After removing protocols, the isSafeAttribute method can be used to verify that the attribute remains safe and adheres to the safelist rules.
